tool_description: Unlock Your Creativity with Midjourney: AI Image Generation API - Simple and Powerful Image Magic! 📸✨
name: Midjourney : AI Image Generation
title: Midjourney : AI Image Generation

api_list.name: variation
api_list.description:
The /variation command allows you to submit variation of existing image using imageId 

![](https://i.ibb.co/rpBK6bN/Screenshot-2023-09-08-153932.png)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://midjourney-ai-image-generation.p.rapidapi.com/variation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "midjourney-ai-image-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: upscale
api_list.description:
The /upscale command allows you to submit upscale request of existing image using imageId

![](https://i.ibb.co/rpBK6bN/Screenshot-2023-09-08-153932.png)

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: zoomout
api_list.description:
The /zommout command allows you to zoomout of image after upscaling image.

api_list.name: describe
api_list.description:
The /describe command allows you to upload an image and generate four possible prompts based on that image. Use the /describe command to explore new vocabulary and aesthetic movements.

![](https://i.ibb.co/nwG1kLs/describe-command-midjourney-cowboy.jpg)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://midjourney-ai-image-generation.p.rapidapi.com/describe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "midjourney-ai-image-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: imagine
api_list.description:
